constructor.details: Constructor     The deploying account becomes contractOwner

fund().details: Initial funding for the insurance. Unless there are too many delayed flights     resulting in insurance payouts, the contract should be self-sustaining

fundAirline().details: Initial funding for the insurance. Unless there are too many delayed flights     resulting in insurance payouts, the contract should be self-sustaining

getNumberOfRegistredAirline().details: Get number of the registred airlines

isCallerAuthorized(address).return: A bool that is the current caller status

isFunded(address).return: A bool that is the state of airline

isOperational().return: A bool that is the current operating status

isRegistered(address).details: check the registration of the airline
isRegistered(address).return: A bool that is the state of airline registration

pay().details: Transfers eligible payout funds to insuree

registerAirline(address).details: Add an airline to the registration queue     Can only be called from FlightSuretyApp contract

setOperatingStatus(bool).details: Sets contract operations on/off    * When operational mode is disabled, all write transactions except for this one will fail
